body: The series is 4 years already. For the anniversary, Moka is selling canvas print for this: https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/97974061 (8000 Yen). Pre-order until tomorrow.
I wish I could follow artists on here. This guy is incredible not just at art but with the story as well. S tier artist.
@zxc-kun : if I'm not mistaken, Moka planned threesome with Iori and Karen in the next Iori route episode.

Really curious where will be the point of no return where he will have to choose either one of the three girls (+harem route). Suzuki is still oblivious to Iori and Karen's feeling, but Haruka's seems close. Not looking forward to the mother's route though; seems good for a side story to Iori's, but not as a winnable heroine in her own route. Personally, Karen is for the fluff; she's the underclassmen character who respect and love you, and makes you want to show your best side to her in return. Iori is more of classmate girlfriend character, typically having more... how do you translate it, 駆引き in the relationship growth. Haruka... the type with dangerous forbidden love taste in it (the kind where they know is dangerous but can't stop their feeling).
FINALLY. I’ve been waiting forever for this one to be translated.
Yh classic dense mc even with hypnotic app
Bloody delicious. Best girl from this series.
Damn i hope for the harem end. Just dicht the sister and more of Iori's mom.
Mc himself forgot that the app can't change the feelings
I hope at some point the author will merge the stories together...
a hypnosis doujin thats vanilla? impossible!
Okay look I liked the Sister but Karen is just fuckin better. However probably not as good as the plot in the final sister one though... But it's still good 9/10.
Ayo Karen ending gon be wildin

i agree segamaxx Karen best girl 

~A TENSHI KOUHAI !!!!!
now im craving for a scene of karen talking with suzuki but iori is getting a bit annoyed when she see suzuki with other girl
